MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath, affecting properties in Moss Side Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.57am. Our engineers have arrived on site and have discovered a faulty underground cable in Moss Side Road.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.23am on 25th of January 2021.
